effect.full: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.shortEffect: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
